possible_violations.violation_name: prohibition of torture and inhuman and degrading treatment

records.context_note: Three men drowned while attempting an illegal border-crossing from Turkey to Greece by crossing a river in a rubber dinghy. Greek border police allegedly shot at the boat after multiple back-and-forths with Turkish border police. The deceased were three Afghans who could not swim. The incident occurred on 28.11.2020. Frontex Human Resources considered the alleged facts could amount to serious breaches of fundamental rights.
records.evidence_quote: three Afghans of the interviewees could not swim and drowned in the river.
